Upper Egypt and the Eternal Nile | Innovative Travel | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Upper Egypt and the Eternal Nile 11 days | Cairo roundtrip Embark on a captivating journey through the mysteries of Ancient Egypt, from the iconic Pyramids of Giza to the hidden treasures of Upper Egypt. With a knowledgeable Egyptologist/guide, delve into Cairo's vibrant streets, where ancient wonders meet modern life, before setting sail on a 4-Night Nile Cruise. Experience the timeless beauty of Luxor and Aswan with an extra night in each city, where the grandeur of temples and the serenity of the Nile await. Explore Luxor's Karnak and Luxor Temples, and venture into the sacred Valley of the Kings, then marvel at Aswan's Philae Temple and the unfinished wonder of the Unfinished Obelisk. As you glide along the Nile, immerse yourself in the daily rhythms of ancient Egypt, discovering its rich culture and traditions at every stop. This journey promises an unforgettable fusion of history and adventure, offering a deeper understanding of Egypt's enduring allure. Deal Details Travel Dates 1 May 2025 - 14 Sep 2026 Priced From $6,826 per person Enquire Now Embark on a captivating journey through the mysteries of Ancient Egypt, from the iconic Pyramids of Giza to the hidden treasures of Upper Egypt. With a knowledgeable Egyptologist/guide, delve into Cairo's vibrant streets, where ancient wonders meet modern life, before setting sail on a 4-Night Nile Cruise. Experience the timeless beauty of Luxor and Aswan with an extra night in each city, where the grandeur of temples and the serenity of the Nile await. Explore Luxor's Karnak and Luxor Temples, and venture into the sacred Valley of the Kings, then marvel at Aswan's Philae Temple and the unfinished wonder of the Unfinished Obelisk. As you glide along the Nile, immerse yourself in the daily rhythms of ancient Egypt, discovering its rich culture and traditions at every stop. This journey promises an unforgettable fusion of history and adventure, offering a deeper understanding of Egypt's enduring allure. Pricing Pricing based on 25 Mar to 10 Apr 26 departure First Class Deluxe Class Super Deluxe Twin share, per person $6,826* $7,488* $12,116* Single Room (with other travellers) $9,844* $13,248* $18,501* Please note, the single room price displayed above is for a single room, in conjunction with other travellers. A solo travellers price is available on request. Other departures dates and pricing are available on request. Please contact your local World Travellers consultant. Preferred Departures: First Class, Deluxe & Super Deluxe: Thursday Supplement may apply for tours commencing on other days. Itinerary Itinerary may change without notice due to river flows, local or other conditions. These changes are beyond the responsibility of World Travellers or local operators. Day 1 Cairo Day 2 Cairo Day 3 Cairo - Luxor Day 4 Luxor Day 5 Luxor Day 6 Luxor - Esna Day 7 Esna - Edfu - Kom Ombo - Aswan Day 8 Aswan Day 9 Aswan Day 10 Aswan - Cairo Day 11 Cairo Highlights A warm welcome with a personal meet and assist inside immigration, together with your Egyptian visa on arrival, followed by express immigration assistance 24/7 service and full local backup from our seven regional offices throughout Egypt Wake up in the shadow of the Pyramids of Giza Learn the ancient Egyptian rites and secrets of immortality at the Mummification Museum Cruise the life blood of Egypt from Luxor to Aswan, discover temples and tombs of the Pharaonic Age Sail around the lush islands of Aswan on a traditional felucca sailboat Explore the treasures in the Egyptian Museum Tour Inclusions VIP Meet and assistance prior to immigration at Cairo Airport Egyptian Visa for US, Canadian, New Zealand, Australian and UK Passport holders Airport departure assistance Air-conditioned transfers and transportation Accommodation in chosen hotel category with private facilities 4 night Nile cruise Domestic flights (Cairo/Luxor and Aswan/Cairo) Daily breakfasts All meals on the cruise (4 lunches & 4 dinners) Professional local English-speaking guides Activities & entrance fees as per the itinerary Entrance fees Upgraded entry to the Valley of the Kings including entrance to Tutunkhamun's and Ramses VI Tombs Tour Exclusions International airfares Optional tours and excursions Porterage Tipping/Gratuities (please refer to tour notes for a recommended guideline) Personal Expenses Departure taxes Hotel charges for minibar or any extra charges Egyptian Visa for non US, Canadian, New Zealand, Australian and UK Passport holders Any other services not clearly mentioned in the inclusions above Terms & Conditions Trip prices and dates are correct at the time of the website going live, however all offers are subject to reconfirmation at the time of booking. All featured tour itineraries and offers maybe subject to change due to seasonal variations without notice, or due to local conditions or other conditions. Please confirm all details at time of booking. Travel insurance is mandatory for all Innovative Travel bookings. All passports must be valid for 6 months prior to your return to your home country. Visas are the responsibility of the traveller. Special VIP meet and assist offers are valid for New Zealand passport holders, for other nationalities please check at the time of booking. For full terms and conditions, please contact your World Travellers consultant. Professional Service Fees may apply. Experience the world differently.
